titleStmt.title: SII 4.373: original edition by H. Krishna Sastri
No. 373. (A.R. No. 50 of 1890). ON THE NORTH WALL OF THE SECOND PRAKARA OF THE SUNDARESVARA TEMPLE AT MADURA, SAME TALUK AND DISTRICT.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . tribhuvaṉaccakravatti koṉermaikoṇṭāṉ Uṭaiyār tiruvālavāyuṭaiyanāyaṉār koyiṟtāṉattārkku
Uṭaiyār tiruvālavāyuṭaiyanāyaṉārkku namperālk kaṭṭiṉa tirumañcaṉattukku kaṟpūraṅ kastūri kuṅkumam cantaṉam paṉi
nīr Uṭpaṭa veṇṭum paṭiviñcaṉattukku veṇṭum mutalukku viṭṭa muttūṟṟukkūṟṟattuk kappalūrāṉa Ulakaḷantaco
ḻanallūrk kariyamāṇikkāḻvāṉ tiruvuṭaināyakarāṉa vīrapāṇṭiyakkāliṅkarāyar kāṇiyāṉa Aṇṭanāṭṭu
ṭpuravarinallūrāṉa cettuvāyttanallūr nāṉkellaik kuṭpaṭṭa naṉcey puṉcey vāḻai koḻuntuḷḷiṭṭa vā
ṉpayirum māvaṭai kuḷavaṭai taṟiyirai cekkiṟai taṭṭoli taṭṭiṟai taṭṭārappāṭṭam Uṭpaṭṭavaṉaittāyaṅkaḷukku
m kaṭamaiyum koṟṟilakkai kaṭaikkūṭṭilakkai pañcupili santivigrahappeṟu vācalviṉiyokam Uṭpaṭṭa Aṉai
ttupātikaḷum m variyiluṅ kaḻittu Ivvūrukku mūṉṟāvatu taimmātam mutal Āṇṭoṉṟukku vāṭāk kaṭamaiyāka
Iṟuttup potum poṉ Aimpatil viḷaṅkuṭināyaṉār vikkiṟapāṇṭīśvaramuṭaiyanāyaṉārkku Iṟuttipotum po
ṉ pattu nikkit taṅkaḷukku Iṟuttuppotum poṉ nāṟpatu Ākap poṉ Aimtum vāṭākkaṭamaiyāka Iṟuttuppo
tumpaṭiyuñ coṉṉom Ippoṉ Aimpatum Ippaṭiyile celvanupavittuk koḷḷavum Ippaṭikku Ivvolai piṭipā
ṭākak koṇṭu Ivvūr nāṉkellaiyilum tiruccūlastāpaṉamum paṇṇik kalliluñ cempilum veṭṭic cantirā
tittavaṟ cella Aṉupavittup potuka Ivai kappalūruṭaiyāṉ Eḻuttu Ivai vāṇātarāyaṉ Eḻuttu yāṇṭu mū
ṉṟāvatu nāḷ [2ḷa8 tulyam . Ip] paṭikku In=ta śilālekhyam paṇṇiṉeṉ Ikkoyiṟ ciṟpācāriyaṉ ppalava
tiruvem ṉāṉa tiruvālavāyācāriyaṉ Eḻuttu U
Digital edition of SII 4.373 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Emmanuel Francis.
